name: Entrust DS3
description: A modern, compact ID card printer designed for secure and professional card issuance. Ideal for organisations that need reliable printing with a clean finish and optional encoding features.

name: Entrust DataCard EM2
description: A dependable desktop ID card printer for everyday card printing needs. Known for consistent quality, easy operation, and suitability for corporate IDs, student cards, and memberships.

name: Entrust With Laminator
description: A printer configuration that includes a lamination module to add an extra protective layer to cards. Used where durability and security are critical, such as government or enterprise IDs.

name: Evolis Primacy
description: A fast and versatile desktop card printer built for medium to high-volume printing. Popular for sharp print quality and smooth performance in corporate and institutional environments.

name: Evolis Primacy 2
description: An upgraded version of the Primacy with improved speed, durability, and security options. Suitable for organizations that need reliable, high-output card production.

name: Fargo DTC 1250E
description: An entry-level desktop ID card printer designed for basic card issuance. Compact, affordable, and ideal for small offices or low-volume requirements.

name: Fargo DTC 1500
description: A robust desktop card printer offering better durability and print quality than entry-level models. Commonly used for employee IDs, access cards, and student badges.

name: Fargo DTC 4500E
description: A higher-end direct-to-card printer built for consistent performance and advanced card personalization. Suitable for medium-scale professional ID programs.

name: Fargo HDP 5000
description: A retransfer card printer that delivers edge-to-edge, high-definition printing. Ideal for smart cards, chip cards, and applications requiring premium print quality.

name: Fargo HDP 6600
description: An advanced retransfer printer designed for high-volume and industrial-grade card issuance. Used by large enterprises and government projects requiring speed and precision.

name: IDP Solid 510D
description: A reliable desktop ID card printer offering good print quality and stable performance. Well-suited for offices, schools, and access control applications.

name: Smart 51
description: A mid-range desktop card printer balancing speed, quality, and affordability. Commonly used for corporate IDs, loyalty cards, and institutional badges.

name: Solid310D
description: An entry-level desktop card printer designed for simple and cost-effective card printing. Best for small businesses and basic ID requirements.

name: Smart 31
description: A budget-friendly desktop card printer for low-volume card printing. Ideal for startups, small offices, and basic PVC card needs.

name: Magicard Enduro 3E
description: A compact and economical card printer designed for simple ID and membership cards. Known for ease of use and suitability for small organizations.

name: Zebra ZC300
description: A modern, user-friendly card printer with a sleek design and quick setup. Commonly used for event badges, membership cards, and office ID cards.

name: Zebra ZXP3
description: A reliable entry-level card printer focused on straightforward card issuance. Suitable for small to medium card printing environments.

name: DataCard CD800
description: A durable desktop card printer built for secure and consistent card production. Often used in enterprise and government ID applications.

name: DataCard SD360
description: A dependable card printer designed for professional ID card issuance. Known for stable performance and good print output in office environments.

name: DataCard SP30
description: A straightforward direct-to-card printer for everyday PVC card printing. Ideal for basic ID cards, memberships, and low-to-medium volume usage.

name: Epson Printer
description: Reliable and high-performance Epson printer suitable for office and professional printing applications with consistent output quality.
